original_text: The Lord's servant, Moses, had died. Then the Lord spoke to Joshua, son of Nun, who had helped Moses in his work.
korean_text: 여호와의 종 모세가 죽은 후에 여호와께서 모세의 수종자 눈의 아들 여호수아에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: The Lord's servant, Moses, had died.
Then the Lord spoke to Joshua, son of Nun,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주께서 눈의 아들 여호수아에게 말씀하셨고,

sentences.original_text: who had helped Moses in his work.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모세를 그 일에서 도왔던 자였다.
